amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: TITLE VI--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS SEC. . None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to limit outreach programs administered by the Smithsonian Institution.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funds to be used to limit outreach programs administered by the Smithsonian Institution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A030) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
